mapper.select: select p.* from step_product p where p.status = 'ON_SHELF' order by p.created_at desc
select sc.* from step_classification sc right join step_product_classification_ref pc on sc.id = pc.classification_id where pc.product_id = #{productId}
select distinct r.* from (select pr.*, ad.sort_index from step_product pr left join step_advertisement ad on pr.id = ad.product_id where pr.status = 'ON_SHELF' ) r order by r.sort_index asc
select b.* from step_book b right join step_product_book_ref pb on b.id = pb.book_id where pb.product_id = #{productId}
